title: Strengthening Hospitality Practical Competencies: Participatory Rural Appraisal (PRA)-Based Medical Education Design: AD

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply PRA techniques (social mapping, matrix ranking, etc.) with 80% accuracy to analyze health needs in rural communities.
Learners can complete the PRA data collection-analysis-proposal writing process in rural settings using VR simulations at least three times.

Learners will develop presentation materials for a health improvement project co-created with local residents, meeting at least three of the four PRA (Participatory Rural Appraisal) evaluation criteria (participation, effectiveness, sustainability, innovativeness), and achieve scores of 80+/100 from at least two out of three evaluators during a 10-minute presentation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
